title: ****UNION SQ NEWLY RENOVATED 3BED/1BA-OFF STREET PARKING INCLUDED!
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE AUGUST 2022', 'PET-FRIENDLY UNIT', 'Available August 2022!', 'The unit is newly renovated.', 'The property has four bedrooms and no living room but can be used as a three bed with one bedroom serving as a living room.', 'Top floor unit with spacious & renovated kitchen with stainless steel equipment and modern bathrooms.', 'The bedrooms are spacious, include closets, hardwood floors.', 'The unit comes with the coin operated laundry in the building.', 'The apartment is near restaurants, shopping, and the MBTA Green Line extension at Union Square.', ' Off-street parking included.', 'Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'BenC @', 'Benjaminapartments .', 'com', '860-485-5721', 'Transportation', 'Bus: 69 Cambridge St @ Berkshire St (0.42 mi)', 'Bus: 87 Somerville Ave @ McGrath Hwy (0.06 mi)', 'Bus: 85 Webster Ave @', 'Prospect St (0.32 mi)', 'Bus: CT2 30 Prospect St (0.24 mi)', 'Bus: 91 Washington St @ McGrath Hwy (0.09 mi)', 'Bus: 80 McGrath Hwy @', 'Poplar St (0.12 mi)', 'Tram: E Union Square (0.24 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Washington St @ McGrath Hwy (0.09 mi)', 'Bus: 88 Medford St @ Washington St (0.13 mi)', 'Bus: 90 McGrath Hwy @', 'Alston St (0.18 mi)']
